greeting_message: G'day! Thanks for calling [BUSINESS_NAME]. How can I help you today?
static_knowledge:
COMPANY INFORMATION

Business Name: [BUSINESS_NAME]
Hours: Monday-Friday 8am-6pm, Saturday 9am-3pm
Phone: (02) 1234 5678
Email: info@[BUSINESS_DOMAIN].com.au
Service Area: Greater Sydney Metro (within 30km of CBD)

SERVICES

Emergency Callouts: 24/7 emergency service available for burst pipes, gas leaks, and blocked drains
General Repairs: Tap repairs, toilet repairs, hot water systems
Maintenance: Annual plumbing inspections and preventative maintenance packages

POLICIES

Callout Fee: Standard hours $99, after hours $149 (waived if repair booked)
Payment: Cash, card, EFTPOS, invoice for approved accounts
Cancellation: 24-hour notice required or cancellation fee applies
Warranty: 12 months on workmanship

COMMON QUESTIONS

Q: Do you offer same-day service?
A: Yes, for emergencies we aim for a 2-4 hour response within our service area.

Q: What areas do you service?
A: Greater Sydney metro, within 30km of Sydney CBD.

Q: Are you licensed and insured?
A: Yes, we are fully licensed and insured (License #123456).
